ds2.1.6:1.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye akusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ vā
ds2.1.6:1.2_1: saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā
ds2.1.6:1.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:2.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.6:3.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṁ cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ
ds2.1.6:3.2_1: sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:4.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
ds2.1.6:5.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṁ—
ds2.1.6:6.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.6:7.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.6:8.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.6:9.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye pīti pāmojjaṁ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṁ attamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.6:10.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:11.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:12.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.6:12.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:13.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:14.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.6:15.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:16.2_0: Yo tesaṁ arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ—
ds2.1.6:17.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṁ diṭṭhigahanaṁ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṁ diṭṭhivipphanditaṁ
ds2.1.6:17.2_1: diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṁ titthāyatanaṁ vipariyāsaggāho—
ds2.1.6:18.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.6:19.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.6:19.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:20.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:21.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.6:21.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:22.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:23.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye na hirīyati hiriyitabbena na hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.6:24.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.6:25.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṁ sārāgo sārajjanā sārajjitattaṁ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.6:26.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ anabhisamayo ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho asaṅgāhanā apariyogāhanā
ds2.1.6:26.2_1: asamapekkhanā apaccavekkhanā apaccakkhakammaṁ dummejjhaṁ bālyaṁ asampajaññaṁ moho pamoho sammoho avijjā
ds2.1.6:26.2_2: avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.6:27.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṁ sārāgo sārajjanā sārajjitattaṁ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.6:28.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṁ diṭṭhigahanaṁ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṁ diṭṭhivipphanditaṁ
ds2.1.6:28.2_1: diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṁ titthāyatanaṁ vipariyāsaggāho—
ds2.1.6:29.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye na hirīyati hiriyitabbena na hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—

ds2.1.6:32.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ micchāvāyāmo—

ds2.1.6:33.4_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:34.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.6:34.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:35.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ micchādiṭṭhi
ds2.1.6:35.2_1: micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṁ samādhibalaṁ ahirikabalaṁ anottappabalaṁ lobho
ds2.1.6:35.2_2: moho abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ samatho paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.6:35.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—

ds2.1.6:36.3_0: dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.6:55.2_1: asātaṁ dukkhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—

ds2.1.6:58.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye doso dussanā dussitattaṁ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṁ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṁ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa—

ds2.1.6:63.2_1: vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha,

ds2.1.6:64.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.6:66.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṁ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṁ dvedhāpatho saṁsayo anekaṁsaggāho
ds2.1.6:66.2_1: āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṁ cittassa manovilekho—
ds2.1.6:66.4_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:67.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.6:67.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:68.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo
ds2.1.6:68.2_1: vīriyabalaṁ ahirikabalaṁ anottappabalaṁ vicikicchā moho ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ paggāho;
ds2.1.6:68.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.6:69.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye akusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ uddhaccasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ vā …pe…
ds2.1.6:69.4_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:70.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.6:71.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittassa uddhaccaṁ avūpasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantattaṁ cittassa—
ds2.1.6:71.4_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:72.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.6:72.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:73.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ micchāsaṅkappo
ds2.1.6:73.2_1: micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṁ samādhibalaṁ ahirikabalaṁ anottappabalaṁ uddhaccaṁ moho ahirikaṁ
ds2.1.6:73.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
